Weathermaster: The Fire of Pa'agrio is heated in the Research Laboratory north wing, Research Laboratory east wing and Research Laboratory west wing. North wing: Core damage. Maintaining output at 20%. East wing: Core in normal operation. Maintaining output at 100%. *Warning! Recommend lowering output to a safe level of 80%.* West wing: Maintaining output at 100%. *Warning! Recommend lowering output to a safe level of 80%.* [Quest _120_PavelsResearch 32043-06.htm|Return]
